import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import LogoTitleH from '../../assets/images/H.png' import LogoTitleL from '../../assets/images/L.png' import LogoUchicago from '../../assets/images/uchicago.png' import Logo from './Logo' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = ['e', 'n', 'g', 'k', 'u', 'a', 'n'] const programArray = [ 'U', 'c', 'h', 'i', 'c', 'a', 'g', 'o', ' ', 'M', 'P', 'C', 'S' ] useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>

H i,
I 'm u
f r o m

MS in Computer Science / new Grad

I'm a gradauting students looking for a role of Software Engineer / Front-End Developer / Back-End Developer / Web Developer / Python Developer with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects in a passionate team.

I am currently pursuing my MS degree in Computer Science at the University of Chicago (expected by Dec, 2022). I have concrete foundations in Computer Science and Mathematics, I have strong engineering capability with elegant coing styles.

I'm a thirst learner, keeping learning and being curious to refresh my mind. I am a team worker, feeling excited to see my own part well-performed and highly compatible to others. I am also a deadline keeper, always trying to finish tasks earlier than what I have promised.

CONTACT ME
) } export default Home
